attributes.action: Use Covid-19 as a means to implement a change in the English Education System.
attributes.background: Use Covid-19 as a means to implement a change in the English Education System, having children repeat the current year and follow the European model whilst changing the starting age of school children to 6 years from September.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want the Government to change the way England's education system works, but we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like the Government to make. Your petition refers to "the European model", but it's not clear exactly what you mean by this.
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: 

All pupils to repeat this current academic year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
